entity.name: MobileConfig

boolean.name: isAppEnabled
boolean.title: Enable app
boolean.help: Allows you to enable this package on the mobile application.

boolean.name: isCustomizeMenuEnabled
boolean.title: Customize menus
boolean.help: Allows you to customize the active menus for this application. If the menus are not configured then all the menus of the application are available.

one-to-many.name: menus
one-to-many.title: Restricted menus
one-to-many.help: List of restricted menus for this application. If this field is empty then all menus are displayed on the mobile application. If a menu is added to the list then its display is restricted to the associated roles. Menus that are not in the list will be visible to all users.

many-to-many.name: authorizedRoles
many-to-many.title: Authorized roles
many-to-many.help: List of roles that have access to this application. If the field is empty then everyone has access to the application. If it contains at least one role then only users with one of the roles present have access to the application.
